macros.macro: // Alterar UID e runa!!!;msg '.recall 040077d7c,12';// Usar comando .mostraruid;

//Closed Helmet;if @findtype 0x1408 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';endif;//Platemail Helmet;if @findtype 0x1412 'any' 'backpack';useobject 'found';endif;//Heater Shield;if @findtype 0x1b76 'any' 'backpack';useobject 'found';endif;//Chaos Shield;if @findtype 0x1bc3 'any' 'backpack';useobject 'found';endif;//Arma;if @findobject 'Arma' 'any' 'backpack';@useobject! 'found';waitingfortarget;@target 'self';endif;if @findlayer 'self' 1 or @findlayer 'self' 2;canceltarget;endif;if not @findobject 'Arma' 'any' 'self';promptalias 'Arma';endif;pause 500;attack 'enemy';

msg '.disarm';//Tall Straw;if @findtype 0x1716 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';stop;endif;// Bear Mask;if @findtype 0x1546 'any' 'backpack' or @findtype 0x1545 'any' 'backpack' 0;@useobject 'found';stop;endif;// Orc Mask;if @findtype 0x141B 'any' 'backpack' or @findtype 0x141C 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';stop;endif;// Deer Mask;if @findtype 0x1547 'any' 'backpack' or @findtype 0x1548 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';stop;endif;// Tribal Mask P;if @findtype 0x1549 'any' 'backpack' or @findtype 0x154A 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';stop;endif;// Tribal Mask G;if @findtype 0x154B 'any' 'backpack' or @findtype 0x154C 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';stop;endif;

// Comer uva;if @findtype 0x9d1 1154 'backpack';useobject 'found';else;headmsg 'Sem Grape of Wrath' 50 'self';endif;pause 100;// Tomar Strength;if @findtype 0xf0e 906 'backpack';useobject 'found';else;headmsg '¨Sem Potion de Strength' 50 'self';endif;

if not @findobject 'Forensic';headmsg 'Selecione o que analisar.';promptalias 'Forensic';else;endif;clearjournal;autotargetobject 'Forensic';useskill 'Forensic Evaluation';while not @injournal 'foi morto';if @injournal 'nao pode dizer';replay;endif;endwhile;

if mounted;useobject! 'self';msg 'all kill';pause 100;if @findobject 'enemy';msg 'all kill';autotargetenemy;else;msg 'all stay';endif;else;if not @findobject 'montaria';sysmsg 'Selecione a montaria';promptalias 'montaria';endif;msg 'all come';useobject! 'montaria';endif;

//---------------------------------------------------;// Macro de Fishing;// Funcoes: Pesca em 20 spots, corta, guarda tudo e navega em quadrado;// Para GShard;// ------------------------------------------;// 1- Estar em cima do bau de seu barco.;// 2- Ter uma vara de pescar e uma lamina na backpack.;// 3- Comecar com o barco apontado para South (S).;// -----------------------------------------------------------;//;// CONFIGURAÇÕES FIXAS;//;if not listexists 'axisx';createlist 'axisx';endif;@clearlist 'axisx';pushlist 'axisx' 4;pushlist 'axisx' 3;pushlist 'axisx' -4;pushlist 'axisx' -3;if not listexists 'axisy';createlist 'axisy';endif;@clearlist 'axisy';pushlist 'axisy' 0;pushlist 'axisy' 1;pushlist 'axisy' 2;pushlist 'axisy' 3;pushlist 'axisy' 4;//;// TARGETS;//;if not @findobject 'vara';headmsg 'Selecione a vara de pesca';promptalias 'vara';endif;if not @findobject 'faca';headmsg 'Selecione a lamina';promptalias 'faca';endif;if not @findobject 'containerdobarco';headmsg 'Selecione o container do barco';promptalias 'containerdobarco';endif;useobject 'containerdobarco';pause 150;@moveitem 'vara' 'backpack';pause 1250;@moveitem 'faca' 'backpack';pause 1250;////////////;// PESCAR //;////////////;msg 'Raise Anchor';for 0 to 12;for 0 to 'axisx';for 0 to 'axisy';@clearjournal;useobject 'vara';waitfortarget 5000;targettileoffset 'axisx[]' 'axisy[]' -3;pause 250;if not @injournal 'Nao ha peixe' and not @injournal 'Tente pescar';if diffweight < 100;break;endif;waitforjournal 'pescou' 15000 'system';@clearjournal;while not @injournal 'Voce pescou' 'system';useobject 'vara';waitfortarget 5000;targettileoffset 'axisx[]' 'axisy[]' -3;pause 250;if not @injournal 'Nao ha peixe' and not @injournal 'Tente pescar';@clearjournal;waitforjournal 'pescou' 15000;else;break;endif;endwhile;endif;endfor;endfor;msg 'Forward';pause 6000;msg 'Stop';pause 1000;endfor;//;// CORTAR;//;while @findtype '0x9cd' '0' 'backpack';autotargettype '0x9cd' // peixe marrom;useobject 'faca';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cf' '0' 'backpack';autotargettype '0x9cf' // peixe amarelo;useobject 'faca';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '0' 'backpack';autotargettype '0x9cc' // peixe verde;useobject 'faca';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9ce' '0' 'backpack';autotargettype '0x9ce' // peixe roxo;useobject 'faca';pause 1000;endwhile;//;// GUARDAR;//;while @findtype '0x14eb' '0' 'backpack' // Tattered Treasure Map;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x99f' '0' 'backpack' // SoS in Bottle;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x97a' '0' 'backpack' // raw fish steaks;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '76' 'backpack' // Truly Rare Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '51' 'backpack' // Prized Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '51' 'backpack' // Prized Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '86' 'backpack' /// Wondrous Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;msg 'Right';pause 10000;msg 'Stop;pause 1000;////////////;//PESCAR 2//;////////////;for 0 to 12;for 0 to 'axisx';for 0 to 'axisy';@clearjournal;useobject 'vara';waitfortarget 5000;targettileoffset 'axisx[]' 'axisy[]' -3;pause 250;if not @injournal 'Nao ha peixe' and not @injournal 'Tente pescar';if diffweight < 100;break;endif;waitforjournal 'pescou' 15000 'system';@clearjournal;while not @injournal 'Voce pescou' 'system';useobject 'vara';waitfortarget 5000;targettileoffset 'axisx[]' 'axisy[]' -3;pause 250;if not @injournal 'Nao ha peixe' and not @injournal 'Tente pescar';@clearjournal;waitforjournal 'pescou' 15000;else;break;endif;endwhile;endif;endfor;endfor;msg 'Back';pause 6000;msg 'Stop';pause 1000;endfor;//;// CORTAR;//;while @findtype '0x9cd' '0' 'backpack';autotargettype '0x9cd' // peixe marrom;useobject 'faca';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cf' '0' 'backpack';autotargettype '0x9cf' // peixe amarelo;useobject 'faca';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '0' 'backpack';autotargettype '0x9cc' // peixe verde;useobject 'faca';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9ce' '0' 'backpack';autotargettype '0x9ce' // peixe roxo;useobject 'faca';pause 1000;endwhile;//;// GUARDAR;//;while @findtype '0x14eb' '0' 'backpack' // Tattered Treasure Map;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x99f' '0' 'backpack' // SoS in Bottle;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x97a' '0' 'backpack' // raw fish steaks;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '76' 'backpack' // Truly Rare Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '51' 'backpack' // Prized Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '51' 'backpack' // Prized Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '86' 'backpack' /// Wondrous Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;while @findtype '0x9cc' '66' 'backpack' /// High Peculiar Fish;moveitem! 'found' 'containerdobarco';pause 1000;endwhile;msg 'Left';pause 10000;msg 'Stop;pause 1000;/////////;// FIM //;/////////;// by Tork;// 16.08.2020;

// Macro cortar corpo e abrir bones;//;if not @findobject 'Arma' 'any' 'self' 1;headmsg 'Selecione sua arma.';promptalias 'Arma';endif;if @findtype 0x2006 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3;@useobject! 'Arma';waitingfortarget;@target 'found';headmsg '*Corpo cortado*';else;endif;if @findtype 0xeca 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3 or @findtype 0xecb 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3;useobject 'found';elseif @findtype 0xecc 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3 or @findtype 0xecd 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3;useobject 'found';elseif @findtype 0xece 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3 or @findtype 0xecf 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3;useobject 'found';elseif @findtype 0xed0 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3 or @findtype 0xed1 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3;useobject 'found';elseif @findtype 0xed2 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3;useobject 'found';endif;

////;// Macro PvP: Recall com Hiding/Stealth;// Na runa (unica na backpack) ou Runebook (configurar para o seu);////;cancelautotarget;@clearjournal;autotargettype! '0x1f14' 'any' 1;cast "Recall";pause 250;if @injournal 'ainda nao esta' or not @findtype 0x1f14 'any' 'backpack';// Alterar UID e runa!!!;msg '.recall 040077d7c,12';// Usar comando .mostraruid;@canceltarget;endif;if @listexists 'RecallHid';@clearlist 'RecallHid';else;@createlist 'RecallHid';endif;useskill 'Hiding';if @findlayer 'self' 6;@moveitem 'found' 'backpack;pause 750;pushlist 'RecallHid' 'found';endif;if @findlayer 'self' 13;@moveitem 'found' 'backpack;pushlist 'RecallHid' 'found';pause 250;endif;pause 1750;headmsg '*Ficando Hidding*';pause 1500;if hidden 'self';@clearjournal;headmsg '*Usando Stealth*';useskill 'Stealth';pause 500;for 0 to 'RecallHid';useobject 'RecallHid[]';pause 500;endfor;removelist 'RecallHid';waitforjournal 'se mover em silencio' 6000 'system';headmsg '*Modo Stealth*';else;for 0 to 'RecallHid';useobject 'RecallHid[]';pause 500;endfor;removelist 'RecallHid';stop;endif;

if not @listexists 'stealth';@createlist 'stealth';endif;@clearlist 'stealth';if @findlayer 'self' 6;@moveitem 'found' 'backpack;pause 750;pushlist 'stealth' 'found';endif;if @findlayer 'self' 13;@moveitem 'found' 'backpack;pushlist 'stealth' 'found';pause 250;endif;if not hidden 'self';useskill 'Hiding';pause 3000;headmsg '*Ficando Hidding*';while not @hidden 'self';pause 25;endwhile;@clearjournal;headmsg '*Usando Stealth*';useskill 'Stealth';pause 500;for 0 to 'stealth';useobject 'stealth[]';pause 500;endfor;removelist 'stealth';waitforjournal 'se mover em silencio' 6000 'system';headmsg '*Modo Stealth*';else;for 0 to 'stealth';useobject 'stealth[]';pause 500;endfor;removelist 'stealth';stop;else;useskill 'Hiding';endif;

if not @findobject 'taming';headmsg '*Selecione o animal.*';promptalias 'taming';endif;@clearjournal;useskill 'Animal Taming';waitfortarget 2000;target! 'taming';while not @injournal 'nao conseguiu';while not @inrange 'taming' 1;if @x 'taming' > x 'self' and @y 'taming' > y 'self';walk 'Southeast';elseif @x 'taming' < x 'self' and @y 'taming' > y 'self';walk 'Southwest';elseif @x 'taming' > x 'self' and @y 'taming' < y 'self';walk 'Northeast';elseif @x 'taming' < x 'self' and @y 'taming' < y 'self';walk 'Northwest';elseif @x 'taming' > x 'self' and @y 'taming' == y 'self';walk 'East';elseif @x 'taming' < x 'self' and @y 'taming' == y 'self';walk 'West';elseif @x 'taming' == x 'self' and @y 'taming' > y 'self';walk 'South';elseif @x 'taming' == x 'self' and @y 'taming' < y 'self';walk 'North';endif;endwhile;if @injournal 'aceitou voce';headmsg '*Tamou*';autotargetobject! 'taming';usetype 0xf0e '2045' 'backpack';stop;endif;endwhile;

//////////////////////////////////;// Macro de Mining para UOSteam;// Servidor: AnCorp Free Shard;// Data: 06/10/2020;////// Funções ////////////////////////;// * Proteção contra PK em Minoc;// * Mining seletivo;// * Guardar ores raros e smeltar comuns;////// NECESSIDADES ////////////////////////;//;// ** Mina de Minoc ou Mina VIP;// ** Ter um container (baú) em seu banco.;// ** Ter uma comum;// que deseja DESCARTAR na seguinte Lista de Minérios:;///////////////////////////////////////;///////// Lista de Minérios ///////////;//////////////////////////////////////;if not listexists 'Pedras';createlist 'Pedras';endif;if not listexists 'Ores';createlist 'Ores';endif;if not listexists 'Raros';createlist 'Raros';endif;if not listexists 'Comuns';createlist 'Comuns';endif;////;// Comuns;////;@clearlist 'Comuns';//pushlist 'Comuns' 0 // Iron;//pushlist 'Comuns' 2480 // Ceramic;pushlist 'Comuns' 2483 // Bronze;pushlist 'Comuns' 2484 // Silver;//pushlist 'Comuns' 2485 // Gold;//pushlist 'Comuns' 2487 // Radioative;//;// Raros (nao mexer);@clearlist 'Raros';pushlist 'Raros' 2490 // Chaos;pushlist 'Raros' 2489 // Order;pushlist 'Raros' 2492 // Infernal;pushlist 'Raros' 2493 // Celestial;@clearlist 'Pedras';// Pedras;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf10 // Emerald;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf11 // Sapphire;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf0f // Star Sapphire;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf18 // Tourmaline;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf13 // Ruby;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf15 // Citrine;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf16 // Amethyst;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf25 // Amber;pushlist 'Pedras' 0xf26 // Diamond;// Ores;@clearlist 'Ores';pushlist 'Ores' 0x19b7 // Um ore;pushlist 'Ores' 0x19ba // Dois ores;pushlist 'Ores' 0x19b8 // Tres ores;pushlist 'Ores' 0x19b9 // Quatro ores;////////////////////////////////////////;// CONFIGURACOES;//////////////////////////////////////;if not listexists 'Pos_X';createlist 'Pos_X';endif;@clearlist 'Pos_X';pushlist! 'Pos_X' -1;pushlist! 'Pos_X' 0;pushlist! 'Pos_X' 1;if not listexists 'Pos_Y';createlist 'Pos_Y';endif;@clearlist 'Pos_Y';pushlist! 'Pos_Y' -1;pushlist! 'Pos_Y' 0;pushlist! 'Pos_Y' 1;if not listexists 'Directions';createlist 'Directions';endif;@clearlist 'Directions';pushlist! 'Directions' 'Southeast';pushlist! 'Directions' 'North';pushlist! 'Directions' 'Northwest';pushlist! 'Directions' 'East';pushlist! 'Directions' 'South';pushlist! 'Directions' 'Southwest';pushlist! 'Directions' 'West';pushlist! 'Directions' 'Northeast';if not listexists 'RunXY';createlist 'RunXY';endif;@clearlist 'RunXY';pushlist! 'RunXY' 'East';pushlist! 'RunXY' 'South';pushlist! 'RunXY' 'Southeast';pushlist! 'RunXY' 'North';pushlist! 'RunXY' 'Northwest';pushlist! 'RunXY' 'Southwest';pushlist! 'RunXY' 'West';pushlist! 'RunXY' 'Northeast';///;//Debug (nao mexer);///;if @findtype 0xe85 'any' 'backpack';@useobject! 'found';if not targetexists;useobject! 'found';endif;elseif @findtype 0xe86 'any' 'backpack';@useobject! 'found';if not targetexists;useobject! 'found';endif;endif;@createtimer 'Guards';pushlist 'Comuns' 1;////;if not @findobject 'ForgeMinoc';headmsg '*Selecione um forge na mina.*';promptalias 'ForgeMinoc';endif;if not @findobject 'bagmining';headmsg 'Selecione o bau em seu banco para guardar os minerios.';msg 'Banker Bank';pause 300;promptalias 'bagmining';useobject 'bagmining';endif;//;// Ir até o forge;// No safe: com +10 raros ou -150 do maximo;// Na VIP: com -5 do maximo;//;if x >= 2557 and x <= 2581;if y >= 474 and y <= 495;if diffweight < 150 or @counttype '0x19b9' '2490' 'backpack' > 10;setalias 'Guardar' 'self';elseif @counttype '0x19b9' '2489' 'backpack' > 10 or @counttype '0x19b9' '2492' 'backpack' > 10;setalias 'Guardar' 'self';elseif @counttype '0x19b9' '2493' 'backpack' > 10;setalias 'Guardar' 'self';endif;endif;endif;if @findalias 'Guardar' or diffweight < 5;headmsg 'Guardando minerios';pause 500;while not @inrange 'ForgeMinoc' 1;if @x 'ForgeMinoc'> x 'self' and @y 'ForgeMinoc'> y 'self';walk 'Southeast';elseif @x 'ForgeMinoc'< x 'self' and @y 'ForgeMinoc'> y 'self';walk 'Southwest';elseif @x 'ForgeMinoc'> x 'self' and @y 'ForgeMinoc'< y 'self';walk 'Northeast';elseif @x 'ForgeMinoc'< x 'self' and @y 'ForgeMinoc'< y 'self';walk 'Northwest';elseif @x 'ForgeMinoc'> x 'self' and @y 'ForgeMinoc'== y 'self';walk 'East';elseif @x 'ForgeMinoc'< x 'self' and @y 'ForgeMinoc'== y 'self';walk 'West';elseif @x 'ForgeMinoc'== x 'self' and @y 'ForgeMinoc'> y 'self';walk 'South';elseif @x 'ForgeMinoc'== x 'self' and @y 'ForgeMinoc'< y 'self';walk 'North';endif;endwhile;//;// Guardar raros e smeltar outros;//;if @findtype 0x13e3 'any' 'backpack';@equipitem 'found' 1;elseif @findtype 0x13e4 'any' 'backpack';@equipitem 'found' 1;else;headmsg 'Nao achou o Martelo';endif;replygump 'any' 0;msg 'Banker Bank';pause 500;for 0 to 'Ores';for 0 to 'Raros';while @findtype 'Ores[]' 'Raros[]' 'backpack';@moveitem 'found' 'bankminerios';pause 1000;endwhile;endfor;while @findtype 'Ores[]' 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';pause 1000;endwhile;endfor;//;// Guardar;//;msg 'banker bank';pause 1000;@clearjournal;for 0 to 'Pedras';if @findtype 'Pedras[]' 'backpack';@moveitem! 'found' 'bagmining';pause 1000;endif;endfor;while @movetype 0x1bf2 'backpack' 'bagmining';pause 1000;endwhile;unsetalias 'Guardar';msg ".disarm";endif;//;// Minerar;//;@cancelautotarget;for 0 to 2;for 0 to 'RunXY';for 0 to 'Directions';for 0 to 'Pos_X';for 0 to 'Pos_Y';@unsetalias 'quit';while not @findalias 'quit';@cancelautotarget;if dead 'self';stop;endif;@autotargettileoffset! 'Pos_X[]' 'Pos_Y[]' 0;pause 50;if @findobject 'righthand';useobject! 'found';elseif @findtype 0xe85 'any' 'backpack';@useobject! 'found';elseif @findtype 0xe86 'any' 'backpack';@useobject! 'found';endif;@clearjournal;@settimer 't_timeout' 0;while @timer 't_timeout' < 15000;///;// Segurança;///;// Chamar guardas;//;if @findobject 'ForgeMinoc';getenemy 'murderer' 'criminal' 'enemy' 'gray' 'humanoid' 'transformation' 'closest';if @inrange 'Enemy' '20' and @timer 'Guards' >= 3000;msg 'Guards';settimer 'Guards' 0;endif;// Ficar sem mana;while mana < 60;if mana < 21;msg '.drinkmana';endif;useskill 'Meditation';pause 3500;endwhile;// Se ficar Paralizado;while paralyzed 'self';autotargetself!;cast "Magic Arrow";pause 2000;endwhile;// Se ficar Poisonado;while poisoned 'self';cast 'cure' self;if @findtype 0xe85 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';elseif @findtype 0xe86 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';endif;pause 2250;turn "Northeast";pause 100;walk "Northeast";pause 100;endwhile;// Se encontrar Fire Field perto;if @findtype 0x398c 'any' 'ground' 'any' 3;turn "Northeast";pause 100;walk "Northeast";pause 100;if skill 'Magery' >= 75;cast "Mass Dispel";if @findtype 0xe85 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';elseif @findtype 0xe86 'any' 'backpack';@useobject 'found';endif;pause 4750;else;pause 1000;endif;endif;// Usar bandage;if hits < 90;if @findtype 0xe21 'any' 'backpack';turn "Northeast";pause 100;walk "Northeast";pause 100;autotargetself!;useobject! 'found';pause 4500;else;if @timer 'Bandage' >= 7000;@settimer 'Bandage' 0;headmsg 'Sem Bandage na Backpack' 50 'self';break;endif;endif;endif;endif;// Se morrer :(;if dead 'self';stop;endif;//;// Jornal;//;if @injournal 'Voce nao encontrou' 'system';break;endif;if @injournal 'Voce pos' 'system';if @injournal 'order' 'system' or @injournal 'chaos' 'system;break;elseif @injournal 'celestial' 'system' or @injournal 'infernal' 'system';break;else;for 0 to 'Ores';for 0 to 'Comuns';if @findtype 'Ores[]' 'Comuns[]' 'backpack';moveitemoffset 'found' 'ground';endif;endfor;endfor;endif;@setalias 'quit' 'self';break;elseif @injournal 'Nao ha nada aqui' 'system' or @injournal 'Tente minerar em outro' 'system';@setalias 'quit' 'self';break;elseif @injournal 'Voce nao tem uma' 'system' or @injournal 'You cannot mine' 'system';@setalias 'quit' 'self';break;endif;endwhile;@clearjournal;if @findobject 'ForgeMinoc';if diffweight < 150 or @counttype '0x19b9' '2490' 'backpack' > 10;replay;endif;elseif diffweight < 5;replay;endif;endwhile;endfor;endfor;for 4;walk 'Directions[]';endfor;endfor;for 8;walk 'RunXY[]';endfor;endfor;// by tork;

//;// Macro de Smelt 2 em 2 para GShard.;// Ter um baú com os minérios e ingots.;// Estar em frente a um forge.;//;if not @findobject 'baumineriosmelt';headmsg 'Selecione o bau com ores e ingots.';promptalias 'baumineriosmelt';endif;if not @findobject 'hammer';headmsg 'Selecione o Smith Hammer.';promptalias 'hammer';endif;//;// Pegar minerios;//;if @findtype '0x19b9' 'any' 'baumineriosmelt';@moveitem 'found' 'backpack' (0 0 0) 2;pause 1000;endif;//;// Smeltar;//;useobject 'hammer';waitforgump 'any' 10000;if @gumpexists 0x483;@replygump 0x483 0;elseif @gumpexists 0x484;@replygump 0x484 0;elseif @gumpexists 0x485;@replygump 0x485 0;endif;while not @injournal 'voce esmeltou o ore' 'system';while @findtype 0x19ba 'any' 'backpack';useobject 'found';pause 1000;endwhile;if @injournal 'nao conseguiu' 'system';@movetype 0x19b7 'backpack' 'baumineriosmelt' 0 0 0 'any';pause 1000;break;endif;endwhile;@clearjournal;//;// Guardar;//;@clearjournal;@movetype 0x1bf2 'backpack' 'baumineriosmelt' 0 0 0 'any';pause 1000;

////;// Macro PvM para usar Discordance;////;if not @findobject 'discordt';headmsg '*Selecione o animal para Discordance*';promptalias 'discordt';endif;@clearjournal;useskill 'Discordance';waitfortarget 15000;target! 'discordt';while not @injournal 'reduzindo a forca' 'system';if @injournal 'ja esta em' 'system';stop;endif;if @injournal 'nao conseguiu' 'system';replay;endif;endwhile;headmsg '*Animal em discordia*' 33 'discordt';stop;

//////;// Macro de Wrestling;// Ter um horse;// Ter bastante bandage na backpack;//////;// Selecionar os animais;if not @findobject 'wrestling';headmsg '*Selecione o animal.*';promptalias 'wrestling';endif;// Atacar;attack 'wrestling';// Mandar parar quando descer o life;while hits 'wrestling' >= 15;pause 250;endwhile;warmode 'off';pause 250;warmode 'off';// Curar os animais;while diffhits 'wrestling' > 10;if hits 'wrestling' < maxhits;if findtype 0xe21 'any' 'backpack';autotargetobject 'wrestling';useobject 'found';pause 5500;else;headmsg 'Limpando bandage.';findtype 0xe20 'any' 'backpack';autotargetobject 0x40355084;useobject 'found';pause 250;endif;endif;endwhile;
